title: Colorful Butterfly Watch Face
summary: Transform your watch into a gorgeous statement with vibrant colors
description: When they land unexpectedly on your hand, time just stops. Butterflies – monarchs of metamorphosis, masters of amazing transformations.It’s because we love nature that we’ve created this series of ten vibrant watch faces. Transform your watch into a gorgeous statement.Features:* 10 beautiful multi-colored butterflies to choose from* subtly-lit hands when in ambient mode* battery indicator and date shown on face * face sustains battery lifeAvailable background colors to choose from:* yellow* blue ocean* deep black night* turquoise* azure* lila* arctic lime* firebrick* golden banana* green peaFor watches with both round and square faces.
descriptionHTML:
When they land unexpectedly on your hand, time just stops. Butterflies – monarchs of metamorphosis, masters of amazing transformations.



It’s because we love nature that we’ve created this series of ten vibrant watch faces.
Transform your watch into a gorgeous statement.

Features:
* 10 beautiful multi-colored butterflies to choose from
* subtly-lit hands when in ambient mode
* battery indicator and date shown on face
* face sustains battery life

Available background colors to choose from:
* yellow
* blue ocean
* deep black night
* turquoise
* azure
* lila
* arctic lime
* firebrick
* golden banana
* green pea

For watches with both round and square faces.
comments: Won't work. I have installed and reinstalled several times and I can only get one butterfly to show up, a green one. Nothing else. Tried to change on my watch (LG Urbane) and one the phone. Zip.
Not animated. People will buy this thinking that it's animated like the Apple Watch. It's not. Not horrible pictures, but not anything special either.
recentChanges: We changed a way You select between butterflies (watchfaces): now by changing a watchface on a watch there is only one face on a list visible and a button to select between 10 butterflies.
